channel.title: Projects on Chao Wang - National Taiwan Normal University - Computer Science and Information Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chao Wang - National Taiwan Normal University - Computer Science and Information Engineering

item.title: Fault-Tolerant Real-Time Messaging for Edge Computing (2017-2019)
item.description: Meeting applications’ message-loss and latency requirements.

item.title: Cyber-Physical Event Processing Middleware (CPEP) (2015-2018)
item.description: Enforcing both application-specific latency requirement and event’s temporal validity.

item.title: Safety Software Systems Design for Self-Driving Cars (2014-2015)
item.description: A collaborative research effort with General Motors, Inc. and University of Pennsylvania, USA.

item.title: Networked Virtual Worlds (2012-2013)
item.description: A scalable networking architecture to allow effective virtual interactions.

item.title: Scheduling Wireless Sensor Networks (2009-2010)
item.description: Leveraging graph theory for low-latency and adaptive wireless transmissions.
